articles.content: The opening shot of Dustin Guy Defas micro-drama The Adults feels like an outtake from a Wes Anderson film, as the camera remains fixed on a standard-issue business hotel room single bed, nightstand,… [+4878 chars]

articles.title: Post Malone Sings 'Sunflower' at NPR Tiny Desk Concert - Vulture
articles.description: Post Malone sings “Sunflower,” “I Fall Apart,” “Circles,” and “Enough Is Enough” at the NPR Tiny Desk Concert.
articles.content: Grab a bouquet of sunflowers, maybe even light a candle, and set the table; its time for a relaxing evening with Post Malone. In his first Tiny Desk Concert at NPR, Malone is joined by a string quart… [+515 chars]

articles.author: ANI
articles.title: Game of Thrones actor Darren Kent passes away - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Darren Kent played a goatherd in Game of Thrones whose animals and child were killed by Daenerys' dragons.
articles.content:
Actor Darren Kent, best known for his role in Game of Thrones, has died. As per US-based news outlet Variety, Kent breathed his last on August 11. He was in his late 30s.
Darren Kent played a shephe… [+1382 chars]
